content: crochet this easy soap saver for yourself or as a gift this is a great eco-friendly alternative to store bought loofahs pattern is free with ads on my website here 3 pattern includes a video tutorial > this pattern is part of the advent > calendar mystery crochet along 2022 to > make last minute crochet gifts for > your loved ones or yourself this is > only 1 of the 30 patterns in the > advent calendar mystery crochet along > but only 24 of them will be made > available for free on nicki s homemade > crafts with ads >**join the free mystery cal here 1 ** > and the only way to > get all 30 patterns ad-free and > printer-friendly is in the ebook the > ebook will be on sale until december > 24th 2022 the code advent5 will save > you $5 between december 1st and 24th > 2022 then the price will go back up > to the regular price so take > advantage if you want to get all the > patterns even ad-free and > printer-friendly >**get the ebook here 2 ** > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this pattern can also be found in my > crochet membership which includes over > 300 patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can join the membership here 4 1 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/crochet-gifts-made-easy/ ref=dec23pattern 2 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/crochet-gifts-made-easy/ ref=dec23pattern 3 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet-soap-saver-holder-pattern/ 4 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/
